source.name: jupyter
source.text: To integrate the ChatGPT API with Jupyter, one of the Python libraries you need to install is <<<ipywidgets>>>.
source.guidance: the page instructs to install two Python libraries - `openai` and `ipywidgets`. `ipywidgets` is used to create interactive elements in the Jupyter notebook.
